document.full_text: insight communications co, controlled by the carlyle group, has put itself up for auction, seeking a deal valuing the u.s. cable operator at up to $4 billion, people close to the deal told reuters.
document.title: exclusive: insight communications explores sale, again-sources
lines_and_colors: insight communications co, controlled by the carlyle group, has put itself up for auction, seeking a deal valuing the u.s. cable operator at up to $4 billion, people close to the deal told reuters.
